prompt: Create a blog website and use sample blog posts and images.
refinedPrompt: Create a visually appealing blog website with a clean and user-friendly design. Implement a responsive layout that adapts well to different screen sizes and devices. Include a header with a logo, navigation menu, and a search bar. Design an engaging homepage that showcases featured blog posts, categories, and a newsletter subscription form. Create individual blog post pages with a title, author, date, featured image, and well-formatted content. Implement a commenting system for users to engage with each blog post. Include a sidebar with recent posts, popular posts, categories, and tags. Create an "About" page with information about the blog's purpose and the author(s). Implement a contact form for users to reach out to the blog owner. Use sample blog posts and images to populate the website and demonstrate its functionality. Ensure the website is optimized for search engines and has fast loading times.
